original: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba ni /
analyzed: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba ni /
translated: Whoever pays homage to the perfection of wisdom

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal @302a *//
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal @302a *//
translated: pays homage to the knowledge of a thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddha.

original: ba'o; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ba'o; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: from this has come the knowledge of a thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddha.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is taught from the knowledge of a thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddha.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o //
translated: a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family who wishes to stand in the knowledge of a thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddha should stand in the perfection of wisdom.”

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
translated: The sons of the Victorious Ones or daughters of the Victorious Ones who wish to attain the wisdom of knowing the aspects of the path, who wish to abandon all the afflictions that are connected with habitual tendencies, and who wish to turn the wheel of Dharma should exert themselves in the perfection of wisdom.

original: sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang /
analyzed: sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang /
translated: The sons of the Victorious Ones or daughters of the Victorious Ones who wish to establish sentient beings in the result of stream enterer, in the result of once-returner, in the result of non-returner, in the state of a worthy one, in a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,🔽and in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should exert themselves in the perfection of wisdom.”

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
translated: “Subhūti, the sons of the Victorious Ones or daughters of the Victorious Ones who wish to see the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas should exert themselves in the perfection of wisdom.

original: sems can rnams 'tshang rgya ba nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams 'tshang rgya ba nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
translated: A son of good family or a daughter of good family who wishes to lead all sentient beings to full enlightenment should make an effort in the perfection of wisdom.

original: khams @302b gsum gyi phul du 'byung bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: khams @302b gsum gyi phul du 'byung bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
translated: A son of good family or a daughter of good family who wishes to rise above the three realms should make an effort in the perfection of wisdom.

original: bdud thams cad pham par bya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: bdud thams cad pham par bya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
translated: A son of good family or a daughter of good family who wishes to defeat all demons should make an effort in the perfection of wisdom.

original: dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o //
translated: A son of good family or a daughter of good family who wishes to gather a community of monks should make an effort in the perfection of wisdom.”

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /
translated: When this had been said, Śatakratu, head of the gods,🔽said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //🔽bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //🔽bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord!

original: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags /
translated: How do bodhisattva great beings stand in the perfection of wisdom?

original: ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags /
translated: How do they stand in the perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality, and the perfection of giving?

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: how is it that when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
translated: they exert themselves in the perfection of giving?

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags /🔽ji ltar na nang @303a *//
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags / ji ltar na nang @303a *//
translated: How do they exert themselves in the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom?

original: stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
translated: “How do they exert themselves in inner emptiness?

original: ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How do they exert themselves in . . . up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature?

original: ji ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How do they exert themselves in the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening?

original: ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang; gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang; gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
translated: signlessness, and aspirationlessness, and the clairvoyances?

original: ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How do they exert themselves in the meditative stabilities and dhāraṇī gateways?

original: ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How do they exert themselves in the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom exert themselves in the perfection of giving.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa legs so //
analyzed: de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa legs so //
translated: it is excellent that you have thought to ask the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfect and Complete Buddha, about this matter.

original: legs so // koo shi ka khyod kyi spobs pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byung ngo //
analyzed: legs so // koo shi ka khyod kyi spobs pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byung ngo //
translated: Kauśika, your eloquence here has arisen through the Buddha’s blessing.

original: koo shi @303b ka ;'di la byang chub sems dpa' dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: koo shi @303b ka ;'di la byang chub sems dpa' dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Kauśika, here bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: gzugs la mi gnas te /
analyzed: gzugs la mi gnas te /
translated: do not stand in form.

original: gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa'i de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa'i de'i tshe /
translated: When they do not stand in form,

original: gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: then they are making an effort with regard to form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te /
translated: They do not stand in feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When they do not stand in consciousness,

original: rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed pa yin no //🔽mig la mi gnas te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed pa yin no // mig la mi gnas te /
translated: then they are making an effort with regard to consciousness.🔽They do not stand in the eyes.

original: gang gi tshe mig la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe mig la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When they do not stand in the eyes,

original: mig la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mig la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: They are diligent with respect to the eye.

original: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mi gnas te /
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mi gnas te /
translated: They do not dwell on the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind.

original: gang gi tshe yid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe yid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When they do not dwell on the mind,

original: yid la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: yid la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: they are diligent with respect to the mind.

original: gzugs la mi gnas te /
analyzed: gzugs la mi gnas te /
translated: They do not dwell on form.

original: gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When they do not dwell on form,

original: gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: they are diligent with respect to form.

original: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la mi gnas te /
analyzed: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la mi gnas te /
translated: They do not dwell on sound, smell, taste, texture, or mental phenomena.

original: gang gi tshe chos la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe chos la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When they do not dwell on mental phenomena,

original: chos la brtson par byed pa yin no //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: chos la brtson par byed pa yin no // mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas /
translated: they are diligent with respect to mental phenomena.🔽They do not dwell on the eye consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas /
translated: They do not dwell on eye contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas /
translated: They do not dwell on the sensation that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi gnas /
translated: They do not dwell on the ear, nose, tongue, body, or mind consciousnesses.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas /
translated: They do not dwell on mind contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas te /🔽gang gi tshe yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la @304a *//
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas te / gang gi tshe yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la @304a *//
translated: He does not stand in the feeling that is conditioned by sensory contact that is mentally compounded.

original: mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he does not stand in the feeling that is conditioned by sensory contact that is mentally compounded,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la brtson par byed pa yin no //🔽sa'i khams la mi gnas te /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la brtson par byed pa yin no // sa'i khams la mi gnas te /
translated: then he is making an effort with regard to the feeling that is conditioned by sensory contact that is mentally compounded.🔽He does not stand in the earth element.

original: gang gi tshe sa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he does not stand in the earth element,

original: sa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: then he is making an effort with regard to the earth element.

original: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas te /
analyzed: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas te /
translated: He does not stand in the water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, or the consciousness element.

original: gang gi tshe rnam par shes khams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rnam par shes khams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he does not stand in the consciousness element,

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: then he is making an effort with regard to the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa la mi gnas te /
analyzed: ma rig pa la mi gnas te /
translated: He does not stand in ignorance.

original: gang gi tshe ma rig pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe ma rig pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he does not stand in ignorance,

original: ma rig pa la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: ma rig pa la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: then he is making an effort with regard to ignorance.

original: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang; skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la mi gnas te /
analyzed: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang; skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la mi gnas te /
translated: They do not stand in the result of stream enterer, the result of once-returner, the result of non-returner, the state of a worthy one, a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, or unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽They do not stand in the level of a śrāvaka or the level of a pratyekabuddha.🔽They do not stand in the level of a bodhisattva or the level of a buddha.

original: gang gi tshe rga shi la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /🔽rga shi la brtson par byed pa yin no //🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rga shi la mi gnas pa de'i tshe / rga shi la brtson par byed pa yin no // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas te /
translated: They do not stand in the conditioned element or the unconditioned element.🔽They do not stand in the element of beings or the element of dharmas.🔽They do not stand in the element of space or the element of consciousness.🔽They do not stand in the element of earth, the element of water, the element of fire, or the element of wind.🔽They do not stand in the element of desire, the element of form, or the formless element.🔽They do not stand in the element of the eye, the element of a visible form, or the element of eye consciousness.

original: gang gi tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: They do not stand in the element of the ear, the element of a sound, or the element of ear consciousness.🔽They do not stand in the element of the nose, the element of a smell, or the element of nose consciousness.🔽They do not stand in the element of the tongue, the element of a taste, or the element of tongue consciousness.🔽They do not stand in the element of the body, the element of a tangible thing, or the element of body consciousness.🔽They do not stand in the element of the mind, the element of a dharma, or the element of mind consciousness.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan @304b gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas te /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan @304b gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas te /
translated: They do not stand in the perfection of giving, the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, or the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When they do not stand in the perfection of wisdom, then

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa yin no //🔽nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa yin no // nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas te /
translated: they are striving in the perfection of wisdom.🔽They do not stand in inner emptiness,

original: gang gi tshe nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: when they do not stand in inner emptiness, then

original: nang stong pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas te /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas te /
translated: they are striving in inner emptiness.🔽They do not stand in up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature,

original: gang gi tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: when they do not stand in the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, then

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: they are striving in the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi gnas te /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi gnas te /
translated: They do not stand in the applications of mindfulness,

original: gang gi tshe dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: when they do not stand in the applications of mindfulness, then

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: they are striving in the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas te /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas te /
translated: He does not stand in the right efforts, the legs of magical emanation, the faculties, the powers, the limbs of awakening, or the noble eightfold path.

original: gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he does not stand in the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: then he is striving in the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas te /🔽gang gi tshe gzugs med pa'i snyoms par @305a *//
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas te / gang gi tshe gzugs med pa'i snyoms par @305a *//
translated: He does not stand in the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, or the formless absorptions.

original: 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he does not stand in the formless absorptions,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: then he is striving in the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi gnas te; gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi gnas te; gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: He does not rest in the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, and the clairvoyances.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: When he does not rest in the clairvoyances, he is diligent in the clairvoyances.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas te /
translated: He does not rest in the meditative stabilizations and dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he does not rest in the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: he is diligent in the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi gnas te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi gnas te /
translated: He does not rest in the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, or the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When they do not stand in the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: then they are making an effort with regard to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang; phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la mi gnas te /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang; phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la mi gnas te /
translated: They do not stand in the result of stream enterer, the result of once-returner, the result of non-returner, the state of a worthy one, or a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: gang gi tshe rang byang chub la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rang byang chub la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When they do not stand in a pratyekabuddha’s awakening,

original: rang byang chub la brtson par byed @305b pa yin no //
analyzed: rang byang chub la brtson par byed @305b pa yin no //
translated: then they are making an effort with regard to a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas te /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas te /
translated: They do not stand in the knowledge of path aspects or in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe /
translated: When they do not stand in the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: then they are making an effort with regard to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i gzugs mi dmigs so; ;gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /🔽'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i gzugs mi dmigs so; ;gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend any feeling, any perception, any volitional factors, or any consciousness in which he could stand or in which he could strive.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend any of the sense fields, any of the components of sensory awareness, or any of the sense objects in which he could stand or in which he could strive.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend any of the emptinesses, any of the doors of liberation, any of the concentrations, any of the absorptions, any of the immeasurables, any of the formless-world meditative attainments, any of the perfections, or any of the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment in which he could stand or in which he could strive.

original: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par pa brgyad dang; mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya ba dang / gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par pa brgyad dang; mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
translated: the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions,

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, and the clairvoyances are non-apprehensible,

original: ting nge @306a *//
analyzed: ting nge @306a *//
translated: the meditative stabilities,

original: 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so //
translated: and the dhāraṇī gateways are non-apprehensible,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs so //
translated: and the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are non-apprehensible.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang; lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang; lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub mi dmigs so //
translated: the fruit of entering the stream, the fruit of being tied to one more rebirth, the fruit of no longer being subject to rebirth, and arhatship,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so //
translated: the knowledge of path aspects, and the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: gzugs la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
analyzed: gzugs la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: they do not join with or separate from form.

original: gang gi tshe gzugs la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gzugs la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: When they do not join with or separate from form,

original: gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: then they are making an effort with regard to form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: They do not join with or separate from feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: When they do not join with or separate from consciousness,

original: rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: then they are making an effort with regard to consciousness.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: He does not unite or divide the sense spheres, elements, and dependent origination.

original: gang gi tshe rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he does not unite or divide dependent origination,

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la brtson par byed pa yin @306b no; ;pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la brtson par byed pa yin @306b no; ;pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: then he is engaged in dependent origination. He does not unite or divide all the perfections, all the emptinesses, and the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening.

original: gang gi tshe byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he does not unite or divide the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening,

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: then he is engaged in the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: He does not join with or separate from the noble truths,🔽the meditative stabilities, the immeasurable aspirations, the formless absorptions, the eight deliverances, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, emptiness,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: signlessness, and aspirationlessness, or the clairvoyances.

original: gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he does not join with or separate from the clairvoyances,

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no //🔽ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no // ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: he is endeavoring with regard to the clairvoyances.🔽He does not join with or separate from the meditative stabilities and dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: When he does not join with or separate from the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: he is endeavoring with regard to the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /
translated: They do not join the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, great loving kindness, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, nor do they separate them.🔽When they do not join or separate the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,🔽then they are making an effort with regard to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /🔽sangs rgyas kyi @307a *//🔽chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par byed pa yin no //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi sbyor mi 'byed de /🔽gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe / sangs rgyas kyi @307a *// chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par byed pa yin no // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi sbyor mi 'byed de / gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: They do not join or separate the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, nor do they separate them.🔽When they do not join or separate the emptiness of all things, then they are making an effort with regard to the emptiness of all things.🔽They do not join or separate the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, great loving kindness, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, nor do they separate them.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no //
translated: When they do not join or separate the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, then they are making an effort with regard to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: It is because the bodhisattva mahāsattva, when practicing the perfection of wisdom, does not apprehend form in the past,

original: gzugs sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //🔽gzugs phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so // gzugs phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: does not apprehend form in the future,

original: gzugs dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: and does not apprehend form in the present.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness in the past,

original: rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: does not apprehend consciousness in the future,

original: rnam par shes pa dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: and does not apprehend consciousness in the present.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: He does not apprehend the constituents, the sense fields, or dependent origination in the past,

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so; ;rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so; ;rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: does not apprehend dependent origination in the future, and does not apprehend dependent origination in the present.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are not apprehended in the limit of the past.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are not apprehended in the limit of the future.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: The thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are not apprehended in the middle.

original: 'phags @307b pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags @307b pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: The noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: signlessness, and aspirationlessness, and the clairvoyances are not apprehended in the limit of the past.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The clairvoyances are not apprehended in the limit of the future.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: the superknowledges are not found in the middle,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //🔽gzungs kyi sgo rnams phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so // gzungs kyi sgo rnams phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: the meditative stabilizations and dhāraṇī gateways are not found in the end,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways are not found in the middle,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not found in the end,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not found in the middle,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: up to the knowledge of all aspects are not found in the end,🔽the knowledge of all aspects are not found in the middle,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: the knowledge of all aspects is not apprehended in the future,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dbus su mi dmigs so //🔽de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i @308a *//
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dbus su mi dmigs so // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i @308a *//
translated: and the knowledge of all aspects is not apprehended in the middle.

original: bus; bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bus; bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then venerable Śāradvatī­putra said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is profound.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” The Blessed One said,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatī­putra,

original: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir /
translated: because the suchness of form is profound,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is profound.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir /
translated: because the suchness of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is profound,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
translated: the perfection of wisdom is profound.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir /
translated: because the suchness of the sense fields, elements, and dependent origination is profound,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is deep.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is deep because the suchness of all the perfections, all the emptinesses, and the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening is deep.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is deep because the suchness of the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness,

original: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir /
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir /
translated: and wishlessness, the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, and the dhāraṇī gateways is deep.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is deep because the suchness of the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha is deep.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi @308b dang; so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo //🔽gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe gal te gzugs gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom, if they do not engage with the notion that physical forms are difficult to fathom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: they practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: If they do not engage with the notion that feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are difficult to fathom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: they practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: If they do not engage with the notion that the sense fields, the elements, and dependent origination are difficult to fathom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: they practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: If they do not practice the thought ‘all the perfections, all the emptinesses, and the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are hard to fathom,’

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: they practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs @311b med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs @311b med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: If they do not practice the thought ‘the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness,

analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang; mngon par shes pa rnams gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: they practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: If they do not engage with the notion that the meditative stabilities and dhāraṇī gateways are hard to fathom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: they are practicing the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: If they do not engage with the notion that the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are hard to fathom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: they are practicing the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na /

analyzed: gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni /

analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //

translated: then they practice the perfection of wisdom.🔽“If they do not engage with the statement ‘the noble truths, dhyānas, immeasurable aspirations, formless absorptions, eight deliverances, nine serial absorptions, emptiness,

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: they practice the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag @312b par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //

analyzed: gzugs ma yin no //

analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma yin no //

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni /

analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bus gsol pa /

analyzed: kye ma / bcom ldan 'das /
