analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de ltar thab bo // de ltar gting dpag dka'o //
translated: This perfection of wisdom is like that—it is a method,🔽it is difficult to fathom,

original: de ltar rtogs par dka'o //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs par dka'o //
translated: it is difficult to understand.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'o //
translated: this perfection of wisdom is like that—it is immeasurable.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i mdun du bshad par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i mdun du bshad par mi bgyi ste /
translated: this perfection of wisdom should not be explained in front of bodhisattva great beings who have newly set out in the vehicle.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas 'jigs dngangs shing skrag par 'gyur du mchi'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas 'jigs dngangs shing skrag par 'gyur du mchi'o //
translated: They will be afraid, alarmed, and terrified when they hear this profound perfection of wisdom.

original: the tshom dang ne ma nur 'tshal du mchi'o //
analyzed: the tshom dang ne ma nur 'tshal du mchi'o //
translated: They will have doubts and uncertainties.

original: mos pa ma mchis par 'gyur du mchi'o //
analyzed: mos pa ma mchis par 'gyur du mchi'o //
translated: They will not have confidence.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: phyir @313a *// mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan par bgyi ste /
analyzed: phyir @313a *// mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan par bgyi ste /
translated: this profound perfection of wisdom should be taught in the presence of irreversible bodhisattva great beings.

original: des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: When they hear this profound perfection of wisdom, they will not be afraid, alarmed, or terrified.

original: the tshom dang ne ma nur 'tshal bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: the tshom dang ne ma nur 'tshal bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: They will not have doubts or uncertainties.

original: thos nas kyang gong nas gong du mos pa dang; 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thos nas kyang gong nas gong du mos pa dang; 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having heard it, they will have increasing confidence, and they will take it up, bear it in mind, read it aloud, master it, and properly pay attention to it.

original: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /
analyzed: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /
translated: Then Śatakratu, head of the gods,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bul 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bul 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: He said to the venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad na nyes pa cir 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad na nyes pa cir 'gyur /
translated: if this profound perfection of wisdom is explained in the presence of a bodhisattva great being who is a beginner, what is the problem?”

original: sh'a radva ti'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāradvatīputra replied,

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: “Kauśika,

original: gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad na /
analyzed: gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad na /
translated: if this profound perfection of wisdom is explained in the presence of a bodhisattva great being who is a beginner,

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas /🔽'jigs par 'gyur /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas / 'jigs par 'gyur /
translated: when they hear this profound perfection of wisdom,🔽they will be afraid,

original: dngangs par 'gyur /
analyzed: dngangs par 'gyur /
translated: terrified,

original: skrag par 'gyur te /🔽phyir ldog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skrag par 'gyur te / phyir ldog par 'gyur ro //
translated: and scared,🔽and they will turn back.

original: spong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will abandon it.

original: de ni mos par yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ni mos par yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: They will not be inspired.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems @313b dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas /
analyzed: theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems @313b dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas /
translated: When those bodhisattva great beings who are new to the vehicle hear this perfection of wisdom,

original: spangs pa'i phyir de log par ltung bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed cing gsog par 'gyur te /
analyzed: spangs pa'i phyir de log par ltung bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed cing gsog par 'gyur te /
translated: they will reject it, and because of that rejection they will create and accumulate karma that will lead to a fall.

original: las byas pa dang bsags pa des kyang /
analyzed: las byas pa dang bsags pa des kyang /
translated: And because of that karma that has been created and accumulated,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang dka' ba de lta bu'i gnas yod do //🔽brgya byin gyis smras pa /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang dka' ba de lta bu'i gnas yod do // brgya byin gyis smras pa /
translated: it will be difficult for them to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: btsun pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śatakratu then said, “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa /
translated: are there any bodhisattva great beings who,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas /
translated: when they hear this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur ba lta yod dam /
analyzed: mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur ba lta yod dam /
translated: will not be afraid, will not be terrified, and will not be overcome with terror?”

original: smras pa / koo shi ka /
analyzed: smras pa / koo shi ka /
translated: Śāriputra replied, “Kauśika,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas /
translated: Those bodhisattva great beings who, having heard this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur te /🔽de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig gam /
analyzed: mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur te / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig gam /
translated: are not frightened, are not intimidated, and do not feel daunted, will before long be predicted to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: gnyis las mi 'da' bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du lung bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyis las mi 'da' bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du lung bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not pass beyond one or two tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas, and will be predicted to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Lord said to venerable Śāriputra,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽de de bzhin no //
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Śāriputra,🔽it is so,

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: it is just so.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha @314a *//
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha @314a *//
translated: Śāriputra,

original: rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas /
analyzed: rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas /
translated: those bodhisattva great beings who, having heard this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang gong nas gong du 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'o; ;pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang gong nas gong du 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'o; ;pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa'o //
translated: and having heard it, they will take it up, bear it in mind, read it aloud, master it, and abide by the perfection of wisdom as it has been taught, they have set out for a long time in the vehicle, they have practiced the six perfections,

original: sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o //
translated: and they have attended on many buddhas.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bus gsol pa /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bus gsol pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: de'i dpe gsal bar bdag gis spobs so //
analyzed: de'i dpe gsal bar bdag gis spobs so //
translated: I have the courage to give a clear example of this.

original: bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: Sugata,

original: de'i dpe gsal bar bdag gis spobs so //
analyzed: de'i dpe gsal bar bdag gis spobs so //
translated: I have the courage to give a clear example of this.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Śāriputra, you should give rise to courage.”

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig ;sh'a radva ti'i bus gsol pa /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig ;sh'a radva ti'i bus gsol pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: dper na / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'i rmi lam na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang / bzod pa bsgrub pa dang /
analyzed: dper na / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'i rmi lam na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsam pa dang / bzod pa bsgrub pa dang /
translated: For example, Blessed One, if a son or daughter of noble family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle were to practice the perfection of wisdom, enter into the meditative absorption of concentration,🔽exert themselves in diligence, accomplish patience,

original: tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba nas /
analyzed: tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba nas /
translated: uphold ethical discipline, and practice generosity,

original: snying po byang chub la mchis pa'i bar du gyur na'ang /
analyzed: snying po byang chub la mchis pa'i bar du gyur na'ang /
translated: up to and including going to the site of awakening,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang @314b chub tu nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi na /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang @314b chub tu nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi na /
translated: one should know that this son or daughter of noble family is close to unsurpassed and perfect awakening.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyid kyis ma log pa zhig gis /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyid kyis ma log pa zhig gis /
translated: if a bodhisattva great being who is not asleep

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pa dang; bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / bzod pa bsgrubs pa dang / tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang / sbyin pa yongs su btang ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pa dang; bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / bzod pa bsgrubs pa dang / tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang / sbyin pa yongs su btang ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te /
translated: How much more so for those who cultivate the perfection of wisdom, who rest in equipoise in concentration, who undertake perseverance, who accomplish patience, who guard morality, and who practice generosity.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi'o //
translated: one should know that those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage have approached unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par gyur te /
analyzed: gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par gyur te /
translated: those who hear this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: thos nas kyang 'dzin cing de bzhin nyid du nan tan du bgyid pa de dag ni /
analyzed: thos nas kyang 'dzin cing de bzhin nyid du nan tan du bgyid pa de dag ni /
translated: and having heard it, retain it, and practice it accordingly,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa ste /
translated: have fully ripened their roots of virtue.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni yun ring po nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni yun ring po nas /
translated: Those bodhisattvas who will take up, bear in mind, read aloud, master, and properly pay attention to this deep perfection of wisdom, they have set out for a long time in the vehicle,

original: theg pa la yang dag par zhugs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: theg pa la yang dag par zhugs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o //
translated: they have planted wholesome roots,

original: sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen bkur ba'o //
translated: they have attended on many buddhas,

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o //
translated: they have been taken hold of by good spiritual friends.

original: bcom ldan 'das /🔽rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang nye bar gyur pa ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang nye bar gyur pa ste /
translated: Blessed One,

original: bla na med pa @315a *//
analyzed: bla na med pa @315a *//
translated: those sons of a good family and those daughters of a good family have come close to a prophecy of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽They will be prophesied to unsurpassed,

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: perfect, complete awakening.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'thad cing 'thad par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'thad cing 'thad par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
translated: “Blessed One, those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who are able to engage with this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom and, having engaged with it, hold it, keep it, read it, master it, and properly pay it homage,

original: rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par rig par bgyi ba dag go /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par rig par bgyi ba dag go /
translated: should be known as irreversible from unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.”

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: dper na / skyes bu la la 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad brgya pa zhig nas 'byung ngam /
analyzed: dper na / skyes bu la la 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad brgya pa zhig nas 'byung ngam /
translated: For example, suppose there were a man who had emerged from a wilderness area that was one hundred leagues in extent,

original: 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad nyis brgya pa dang / sum brgya pa dang / bzhi brgya pa dang / lnga brgya pa nas 'byung ba zhig mchis la /
analyzed: 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad nyis brgya pa dang / sum brgya pa dang / bzhi brgya pa dang / lnga brgya pa nas 'byung ba zhig mchis la /
translated: or from a wilderness area that was two hundred leagues, three hundred leagues, four hundred leagues, or five hundred leagues in extent,

original: de 'byung ba'i tshe grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi lnga ltas pa lang rdzi'am phyugs rdzi'am /🔽sa mtshams sam bza' shing gi ra ba phun sum tshogs pa'am /
analyzed: de 'byung ba'i tshe grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi lnga ltas pa lang rdzi'am phyugs rdzi'am / sa mtshams sam bza' shing gi ra ba phun sum tshogs pa'am /
translated: When that happens, he sees the signs of a village, a town, a city, a country, or a royal palace.🔽He sees a perfect pasture for cattle, a perfect border, a perfect orchard,

original: nags tshal phun sum tshogs pa mthong ngam /
analyzed: nags tshal phun sum tshogs pa mthong ngam /
translated: or a perfect forest.

original: de ma lags pa gzhan yang mtshan ma gang gis grong ngam /🔽grong khyer ram /
analyzed: de ma lags pa gzhan yang mtshan ma gang gis grong ngam / grong khyer ram /
translated: Moreover, he sees other signs that indicate the presence of a village,🔽a town,

original: grong rdal lam; khams sam /
analyzed: grong rdal lam; khams sam /
translated: a city, a country,🔽or a royal palace.

original: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor mchis par mngon par snga ltas de lta bu dag mthong na /🔽de 'di snyam du gyur te /
analyzed: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor mchis par mngon par snga ltas de lta bu dag mthong na / de 'di snyam du gyur te /
translated: When he sees such signs,

original: snga ltas 'di dag snang ba lags na /
analyzed: snga ltas 'di dag snang ba lags na /
translated: he thinks, ‘Since these signs are appearing,

original: 'di nas grong @315b ngam; grong khyer ram /
analyzed: 'di nas grong @315b ngam; grong khyer ram /
translated: a village, a town,

original: grong rdal lam /
analyzed: grong rdal lam /
translated: a city,

original: khams sam / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ni nye'o snyam ste /
analyzed: khams sam / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ni nye'o snyam ste /
translated: a country, or a royal palace must be nearby.’

original: dbugs phyin par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: dbugs phyin par 'gyur zhing /
translated: He is relieved.

original: de la de slan chad rkun po'i 'jigs pa'am /
analyzed: de la de slan chad rkun po'i 'jigs pa'am /
translated: From then on, he is no longer afraid of robbers,

original: chom po'i 'jigs pa'am /🔽gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa'am /
analyzed: chom po'i 'jigs pa'am / gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa'am /
translated: or the fear of robbers,🔽or the fear of wild beasts,

original: bkres pa dang / skom pa'i 'jigs pa ma mchis so //
analyzed: bkres pa dang / skom pa'i 'jigs pa ma mchis so //
translated: or the fear of hunger and thirst.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gang gi tshe /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gang gi tshe /
translated: in the same way, when a bodhisattva great being

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'thad par gyur te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'thad par gyur te /
translated: has this profound perfection of wisdom available,

original: 'thad par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na /
analyzed: 'thad par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na /
translated: and having it available, takes it up, bears it in mind, reads it aloud, masters it, and properly pays attention to it,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi ba ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi ba ste /
translated: at that time, one should know that the bodhisattva great being is close to the prophecy,

original: ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening before long.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des /
translated: That bodhisattva great being

original: de slan chad nyan thos kyi sa'am; rang sangs rgyas kyi sas 'jigs par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: de slan chad nyan thos kyi sa'am; rang sangs rgyas kyi sas 'jigs par mi bgyi'o //
translated: I will not be afraid of the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / 'di lta ste /
translated: Why is that?🔽It is because of seeing this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mnyan du mchis pa de nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi snga ltas so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / mnyan du mchis pa de nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi snga ltas so //
translated: venerating it, and listening to it that I have the omen of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽de de bzhin no //
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Śāriputra,🔽it is just so,

original: de de bzhin te /🔽sh'a radva @316a *//
analyzed: de de bzhin te / sh'a radva @316a *//
translated: just so.🔽Śāriputra,

original: ti'i bu khyod kyis da dung yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus spobs pa skyed cig /
analyzed: ti'i bu khyod kyis da dung yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus spobs pa skyed cig /
translated: you should still generate eloquence through the power of the Buddha.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Lord,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is just as you have said.

original: dper na / skyes bu la la zhig rgya mtsho mching rnams chen po blta bar 'tshal nas /
analyzed: dper na / skyes bu la la zhig rgya mtsho mching rnams chen po blta bar 'tshal nas /
translated: For example, someone who wants to see the great ocean

original: de rgya mtsho chen po blta ba'i slad du /
analyzed: de rgya mtsho chen po blta ba'i slad du /
translated: in order to see the great ocean

original: de ji lta ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar mchis pa de lta de ltar ldum bu'am /
analyzed: de ji lta ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar mchis pa de lta de ltar ldum bu'am /
translated: The closer he gets to the ocean, the more he will not see any trees,

original: ldum bu'i mtshan ma'am /
analyzed: ldum bu'i mtshan ma'am /
translated: or signs of trees,

original: ri'am / ri'i mtshan ma ma mthong na /
analyzed: ri'am / ri'i mtshan ma ma mthong na /
translated: or mountains, or signs of mountains.

original: des 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po thag nye ste /
analyzed: des 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po thag nye ste /
translated: He will know, ‘The great ocean is near.

original: 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po ring po med do //
analyzed: 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po ring po med do //
translated: The great ocean is not far from here.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: rgya mtsho chen po ni bags kyis gzhol ba ste /
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po ni bags kyis gzhol ba ste /
translated: The great ocean slopes gradually.

original: 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po'i drung du da ni ring po med do //
analyzed: 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po'i drung du da ni ring po med do //
translated: The great ocean is not far from here.

original: de dang nye ba na ni ldum bu'am /
analyzed: de dang nye ba na ni ldum bu'am /
translated: Near it, there are no trees,

original: ldum bu'i mtshan ma'am /
analyzed: ldum bu'i mtshan ma'am /
translated: or signs of trees,

original: ri'am ri'i mtshan ma gang yang med do zhes bgyi bar rig go /
analyzed: ri'am ri'i mtshan ma gang yang med do zhes bgyi bar rig go /
translated: or mountains, or signs of mountains.’

original: de ltar skyes bu de'i mig gis rgya mtsho chen po ma mthong du lags kyang /
analyzed: de ltar skyes bu de'i mig gis rgya mtsho chen po ma mthong du lags kyang /
translated: In that way, although the man’s eyes do not see the great ocean,

original: des bdag ni rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar gyur to //
analyzed: des bdag ni rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar gyur to //
translated: he will know, ‘I am near the great ocean.

original: rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di na yod do //
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di na yod do //
translated: The great ocean is here.’

original: rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di phan chad mi ring ngo zhes bgyi bar rtogs par 'tshal to //
analyzed: rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di phan chad mi ring ngo zhes bgyi bar rtogs par 'tshal to //
translated: ‘The great ocean is not far from here.’

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,🔽in the same way, when a bodhisattva great being hears this profound perfection of wisdom, and receives it, holds it, reads it aloud, masters it, and properly pays attention to it,

original: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang /
analyzed: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang /
translated: that bodhisattva great being should understand, ‘The Tathāgata, the Worthy, the Perfectly Awakened One has predicted my unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bdag de @316b bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod bskal pa ni 'di snyed cig /🔽bskal pa brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig /🔽bskal pa stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig ;bskal pa brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di snyed cig /
analyzed: bdag de @316b bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod bskal pa ni 'di snyed cig / bskal pa brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig / bskal pa stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig ;bskal pa brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di snyed cig /
translated: The Tathāgata, the Worthy, the Perfectly Awakened One has said to me, “You will become a tathāgata, a worthy one, a perfectly awakened one by the name of such and such in such and such an eon.🔽You will become a tathāgata, a worthy one, a perfectly awakened one by the name of such and such in such and such an eon.

original: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di snyed cig na /
analyzed: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di snyed cig na /
translated: You will become a tathāgata, a worthy one, a perfectly awakened one by the name of such and such in such and such an eon.🔽You will become a tathāgata, a worthy one, a perfectly awakened one by the name of such and such in such and such an eon.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon sum du lung bstan pas da dung lung ma bstan gyis kyang /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon sum du lung bstan pas da dung lung ma bstan gyis kyang /
translated: and will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang nye bar gnas par blta'o //
analyzed: bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang nye bar gnas par blta'o //
translated: “I am close to receiving a prophecy of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: “Why is that?”

original: de ni 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur du yod la mnyan du yod do //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur du yod la mnyan du yod do //
translated: “It is because I have seen this deep perfection of wisdom, have bowed down to it, have honored it, and have listened to it.

original: thos nas kyang gzung du yod do //
analyzed: thos nas kyang gzung du yod do //
translated: Having listened to it, I have taken it up.

original: bcang du yod /
analyzed: bcang du yod /
translated: I have kept it.

original: bklag tu yod /🔽kun chub par byar yod /
analyzed: bklag tu yod / kun chub par byar yod /
translated: I have read it.🔽I have understood it.

original: tshul bzhin du yid la byar yod do zhes bgyi bar rig par bgyi'o; ;bcom ldan 'das /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: tshul bzhin du yid la byar yod do zhes bgyi bar rig par bgyi'o; ;bcom ldan 'das / 'di lta ste /
translated: I have properly paid attention to it.”🔽“To illustrate, Bhagavān,

original: dper na / dpyid kyi dus la bab ste /
analyzed: dper na / dpyid kyi dus la bab ste /
translated: in the spring,

original: rtsi shing gi lo ma dang 'dab ma lhags nas kha dog gyur pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rtsi shing gi lo ma dang 'dab ma lhags nas kha dog gyur pa'i tshe /
translated: When the leaves and petals of the trees and plants fall and change color,

original: 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis /
analyzed: 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis /
translated: the people of Jambudvīpa

original: ring po mi thogs par lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ring po mi thogs par lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: know that it will not be long before the leaves, flowers, and fruits appear.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar snga ltas 'di dag rtsi shing las snang ngo zhes bgyi bar 'tshal bar @317a *//🔽bgyi ste / gang gi tshe rtsi shing rnams lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par gyur pa de'i tshe'ang bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag gis rtsi shing gi lo ma dang /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar snga ltas 'di dag rtsi shing las snang ngo zhes bgyi bar 'tshal bar @317a *// bgyi ste / gang gi tshe rtsi shing rnams lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par gyur pa de'i tshe'ang bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag gis rtsi shing gi lo ma dang /
translated: Because these signs appear on the trees.

original: me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa de dag mthong nas /
analyzed: me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa de dag mthong nas /
translated: When the trees are fully endowed with leaves, flowers, and fruits, then men, women, boys, and girls, seeing those fully endowed leaves, flowers, and fruits of the trees,

original: nyams bde bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyams bde bar 'gyur ro //
translated: are delighted.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang gang gi tshe /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang gang gi tshe /
translated: in the same way, when bodhisattva great beings

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mnyan du mchis te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mnyan du mchis te /
translated: I have come to see, pay homage to, and serve this profound perfection of wisdom.

original: thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: thos nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de'i tshe /
translated: Having heard it, I will hold, maintain, read, master it, and properly pay attention to it.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par rig par bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par rig par bgyi'o //
translated: at that time, one should know that the roots of virtue of that bodhisattva great being have ripened.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis par rig par bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis par rig par bgyi'o //
translated: one should know that that bodhisattva great being has served many buddhas.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des kyang 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mnyan du yod pa dang / ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byar yod pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des kyang 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mnyan du yod pa dang / ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byar yod pa ni /
translated: and I have worshipped it, and I have attended to it, and I have heard it, and I have practiced the perfection of wisdom as it was taught.

original: sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @317b pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur to zhes bgyi bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @317b pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur to zhes bgyi bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
translated: I have approached unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening through my previous roots of merit.’

original: de ni lha'i bu sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i snga ltas de dag mthong nas /
analyzed: de ni lha'i bu sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i snga ltas de dag mthong nas /
translated: “Moreover, divine son, the gods who have seen previous buddhas🔽will see those signs of the bodhisattva great being

original: sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lung bstan par 'gyur ba la yang snga ltas 'di dag byung gis /
analyzed: sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams lung bstan par 'gyur ba la yang snga ltas 'di dag byung gis /
translated: and think, ‘The previous bodhisattva great beings were prophesied to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening after these signs appeared.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'ang ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes dga' zhing spro la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'ang ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes dga' zhing spro la /
translated: This bodhisattva mahāsattva will also before long receive a prophecy of his unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.’

original: yid bde zhing nyams bde bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yid bde zhing nyams bde bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be delighted, joyful, happy, and elated.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: dper na / bud med sbrum ma ni ji lta ji ltar btsar nye ba de lta de ltar lus 'gyur te /
analyzed: dper na / bud med sbrum ma ni ji lta ji ltar btsar nye ba de lta de ltar lus 'gyur te /
translated: A pregnant woman’s body changes as the time of delivery draws near.

original: de lta de ltar slar zhing lus ngal la /
analyzed: de lta de ltar slar zhing lus ngal la /
translated: Her body becomes tired,

original: rgyud zhan zhing mi dga' la kha zas yi gar mi mchi zhing rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyang chung du 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyud zhan zhing mi dga' la kha zas yi gar mi mchi zhing rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyang chung du 'gyur te /
translated: her mind is weak and unhappy, she has no appetite, and her sleep and energy decrease.

original: nyams mi bde ba des smra ba nyung zhing /
analyzed: nyams mi bde ba des smra ba nyung zhing /
translated: She is uncomfortable and speaks little.

original: bsten pa'i ngang tshul ma mchis la /
analyzed: bsten pa'i ngang tshul ma mchis la /
translated: She is not inclined to be helpful.

original: sngon gyi tshul bzhin ma lags pa'i yid la bgyid pa bsten pa dang / bsnyen pa des rnam pa de lta bu'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: sngon gyi tshul bzhin ma lags pa'i yid la bgyid pa bsten pa dang / bsnyen pa des rnam pa de lta bu'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te /
translated: Because of her previous improper thoughts and behavior, she experiences such feelings.

original: bud med gzhan dag gis bud med de'i mtshan ma ji lta ji ltar mthong ba las bud med 'di ni ring po mi thogs par btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar 'tshal to //
analyzed: bud med gzhan dag gis bud med de'i mtshan ma ji lta ji ltar mthong ba las bud med 'di ni ring po mi thogs par btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar 'tshal to //
translated: Other women can tell from the signs on a woman’s body how long it will be before she gives birth.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,🔽in the same way,

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @318a *//
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @318a *//
translated: the bodhisattva great beings

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
translated: who have planted wholesome roots,

original: sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba /
translated: who have served many buddhas,

original: legs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa /
analyzed: legs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa /
translated: who have practiced good conduct,

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba /
translated: who have been taken hold of by spiritual friends,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa rnams la'ang /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa rnams la'ang /
translated: and whose wholesome roots have ripened

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'thad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'thad par 'gyur te /
translated: can understand this profound perfection of wisdom.

original: 'thad par gyur nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na /
analyzed: 'thad par gyur nas kyang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na /
translated: And having understood it, they will take it up, bear it in mind, read it aloud, master it, and attend to it properly.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi'o //
translated: One should know that those bodhisattva great beings will not be long in receiving a prophecy of unsurpassed and perfect awakening.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: legs so // legs so //
analyzed: legs so // legs so //
translated: excellent, excellent!

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu khyod kyis spobs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus skyes so //
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu khyod kyis spobs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus skyes so //
translated: Śāradvatīputra, that eloquence of yours has arisen through the power of the Buddha.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de ltar legs par yongs su bzung ba ni ngo mtshar che'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag de ltar legs par yongs su bzung ba ni ngo mtshar che'o //
translated: it is truly amazing that the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas have so well taken care of those bodhisattva great beings.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten @318b la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi'i tshogs skye bo phal po che'i don dang /🔽phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten @318b la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi'i tshogs skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir /
translated: Subhuti: Because those Bodhisattvas, those great beings, have set out for the benefit and welfare of the whole world, out of compassion for all beings, for the sake of the multitude, for the welfare and benefit of devas and men.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is because those bodhisattva great beings have set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening in order to benefit many beings, to bring happiness to many beings, to compassionately care for the world, and for the welfare, benefit, and happiness of a great multitude of beings, including gods and humans.

original: de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /🔽bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can brgya stong mang po la phan 'dogs te /
analyzed: de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can brgya stong mang po la phan 'dogs te /
translated: They practice the bodhisattva way of life

original: bzhi gang zhe na /
analyzed: bzhi gang zhe na /
translated: and benefit many hundreds of thousands of beings with the four means of gathering:

original: sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don du spyod pa dang / don mthun par spyod pa ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don du spyod pa dang / don mthun par spyod pa ste /
translated: generosity, kind speech, meaningful conduct, and consistency between words and deeds.

original: de dag gis sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: de dag gis sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: They encourage beings to engage in the ten virtuous actions.

original: bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug la /
analyzed: bdag kyang bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug la /
translated: I myself will enter into the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, and the four formless absorptions.

original: gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: I will also encourage others to enter into the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, and the four formless absorptions.

original: bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong la /
analyzed: bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong la /
translated: I myself will give gifts.

original: gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang sbyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: I will also encourage others to give gifts.

original: bdag kyang tshul khrims srung la /
analyzed: bdag kyang tshul khrims srung la /
translated: I myself will guard morality.

original: gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang tshul khrims la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: I will also encourage others to guard morality.

original: bdag kyang bzod pa sgom la /
analyzed: bdag kyang bzod pa sgom la /
translated: I myself will cultivate patience.

original: gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang bzod pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: I will also encourage others to cultivate patience.

original: bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom la /
analyzed: bdag kyang brtson 'grus rtsom la /
translated: I myself will make an effort at perseverance.

original: gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: I will also encourage others to make an effort at perseverance.

original: bdag kyang bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug la /
analyzed: bdag kyang bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug la /
translated: I myself will become absorbed in concentration.

original: gzhan yang bsam gtan la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang bsam gtan la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: I will also encourage others to become absorbed in concentration.

original: bdag kyang shes @319a *//
analyzed: bdag kyang shes @319a *//
translated: I myself will cultivate wisdom.

original: rab sgom la /
analyzed: rab sgom la /
translated: For the best,🔽🔽

original: gzhan yang shes rab bsgom pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang shes rab bsgom pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, they encourage others to practice wisdom.

original: de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god kyang /
analyzed: de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god kyang /
translated: While they abide in the perfection of wisdom, they use skillful means to establish beings in the result of stream enterer,

original: bdag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed do //
analyzed: bdag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mi byed do //
translated: but they do not themselves attain the result of stream enterer.🔽They establish others in the result of once-returner, the result of non-returner,

original: gzhan lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang; phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la rab tu 'god kyang /
analyzed: gzhan lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang; phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la rab tu 'god kyang /
translated: arhatship, and individual enlightenment,

original: bdag rang byang chub mngon du mi byed do //
analyzed: bdag rang byang chub mngon du mi byed do //
translated: but they do not themselves actualize individual enlightenment.

original: bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod la /
analyzed: bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod la /
translated: They themselves practice the perfection of generosity,

original: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang /
translated: and they encourage many thousands of other bodhisattvas

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: to practice the perfection of generosity.

original: bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod la /
analyzed: bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod la /
translated: I myself practice the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan stong phrag du ma dag kyang /
translated: And I inspire many thousands of other bodhisattvas

original: tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: to take up the perfection of morality, patience, perseverance, concentration, and wisdom.

original: bdag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su gnon la /
analyzed: bdag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su gnon la /
translated: I myself reach the irreversible stage.

original: gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu 'god do //🔽bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed la /
analyzed: gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu 'god do // bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed la /
translated: And I inspire others to reach the irreversible stage.🔽I myself purify a buddhafield.

original: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing @319b yongs su dag par bya ba la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing @319b yongs su dag par bya ba la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: And I inspire others to purify a buddhafield.

original: bdag kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed la /
analyzed: bdag kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed la /
translated: I myself will bring beings to maturity.

original: gzhan yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: I will also encourage others to bring beings to maturity.

original: bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed la /
analyzed: bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bskyed la /
translated: I myself will develop the superknowledges of the bodhisattvas.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: I will also encourage others to develop the superknowledges of the bodhisattvas.

original: bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo yongs su sbyong la /
analyzed: bdag kyang gzungs kyi sgo yongs su sbyong la /
translated: I myself will purify the dhāraṇī gateway.

original: gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo yongs su spyong ba la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo yongs su spyong ba la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: I will also encourage others to purify the dhāraṇī gateway.

original: bdag kyang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par byed la /
analyzed: bdag kyang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par byed la /
translated: I myself will attain perfect eloquence.

original: gzhan yang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: I will also encourage others to attain perfect eloquence.

original: bdag kyang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin la /
analyzed: bdag kyang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin la /
translated: I myself will attain the perfection of form.

original: gzhan yang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba la yang dag par bskul lo; ;bdag kyang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin la /
analyzed: gzhan yang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba la yang dag par bskul lo; ;bdag kyang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin la /
translated: I will also encourage others to attain the perfection of form. I myself will attain the perfection of the major marks.

original: gzhan yang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang mtshan phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: They encourage others to attain the perfection of marks.

original: bdag kyang gzhon nu'i sa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin la /
analyzed: bdag kyang gzhon nu'i sa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin la /
translated: They themselves take up the perfection of youthfulness.

original: gzhan yang gzhon nu'i sa phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang gzhon nu'i sa phun sum tshogs pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: They encourage others to take up the perfection of youthfulness.

original: bdag kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom la /
analyzed: bdag kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom la /
translated: They themselves cultivate the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment.

original: gzhan yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: They encourage others to cultivate the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment.

original: bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / @320a *//
analyzed: bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / @320a *//
translated: They themselves cultivate the four noble truths, the four concentrations, the four immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang; mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga sgom la /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang; mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga sgom la /
translated: the four formless absorptions, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, and the five higher perceptions.

original: gzhan yang mngon par shes pa lnga la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang mngon par shes pa lnga la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: They also encourage others to attain the five superknowledges.

original: bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad sgom la /
analyzed: bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad sgom la /
translated: They themselves cultivate all the meditative stabilities and all the dhāraṇī gateways,

original: gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: and they also encourage others to attain all the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang; mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgrub la /
analyzed: bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang; mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgrub la /
translated: They themselves accomplish the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: and they also encourage others to attain the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: bdag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed la /
analyzed: bdag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed la /
translated: They themselves attain the knowledge of all aspects,

original: gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: and they also encourage others to attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bdag kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong la /
analyzed: bdag kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong la /
translated: I myself will completely abandon all the afflictions that are the connections of habitual tendencies,

original: gzhan yang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: and I will encourage others to completely abandon all the afflictions that are the connections of habitual tendencies.

original: bdag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor la /
analyzed: bdag kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skor la /
translated: I myself will turn the wheel of the Dharma,

original: gzhan yang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba la yang dag par bskul @320b lo; ;de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
analyzed: gzhan yang chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba la yang dag par bskul @320b lo; ;de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
translated: and I will encourage others to turn the wheel of the Dharma.

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: The Lord having said that, the venerable Subhūti said to him,

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan mang po dang ldan pa de dag sems can thams cad kyi slad du /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan mang po dang ldan pa de dag sems can thams cad kyi slad du /
translated: “Lord, it is amazing how much these bodhisattva great beings, endowed with many good qualities,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: practicing the perfection of wisdom for the sake of all beings,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni; bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni; bcom ldan 'das /
translated: will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: ngo mtshar to //
analyzed: ngo mtshar to //
translated: It is amazing,

original: bde bar gshegs pa /
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa /
translated: Sugata,

original: ngo mtshar to //
analyzed: ngo mtshar to //
translated: it is amazing!

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur pa lags /
analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur pa lags /
translated: how is it that the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom of the bodhisattva great beings becomes complete?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: nam gzugs kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: nam gzugs kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe /
translated: when they do not see the increase of form, and do not see the increase of feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: at that time the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom of the bodhisattva great beings becomes complete.”

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: nam skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba @321a *//
analyzed: nam skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba @321a *//
translated: do not see the increase of the sense spheres, elements, and dependent origination,

original: dang; pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: dang; pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe /
translated: and do not see the increase of all the perfections, all the emptinesses, and the thirty-seven factors of awakening,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the bodhisattva great beings' cultivation of the perfection of wisdom becomes complete.

original: nam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang; bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang; bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the nine serial absorptions,🔽emptiness,🔽signlessness,🔽wishlessness,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe /
translated: and the clairvoyances,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the bodhisattva great beings’ cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is complete.🔽When they do not see an increase in the meditative stabilizations

original: nam ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: nam ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe /
translated: and dhāraṇī gateways,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the bodhisattva great beings’ cultivation of the perfection of wisdom is complete.”

original: nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'phel @321b ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'phel @321b ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe /
translated: When they do not see the increase of the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings is completed.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe /

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the cultivation of the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings is completed.

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

analyzed: nam gzugs kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: nam skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro; ;nam pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe / byang chub sems @322a *//
translated: When he does not see the diminution of all the perfections,🔽all the emptinesses,

analyzed: dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //

translated: the nine serial absorptions,🔽emptiness,

analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i che /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: nam ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba de'i tshe /
translated: When they do not see the diminution of the meditative stabilizations and dhāraṇī gateways,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
