translated: in the future,

original: byang gi phyogs cha der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo ni mang du 'byung ste /
analyzed: byang gi phyogs cha der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo ni mang du 'byung ste /
translated: In the northern direction, Śāriputra, there will be many sons of enlightened heritage and daughters of enlightened heritage who follow the Great Vehicle.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe /
translated: Śāriputra,🔽when this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom is being taught,

original: mi 'jum / yongs su mi 'jum /
analyzed: mi 'jum / yongs su mi 'jum /
translated: those sons of enlightened heritage and daughters of enlightened heritage will not be timid, will not be overawed,

original: mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni mang ngo //
analyzed: mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni mang ngo //
translated: and will not be frightened, terrified, or become fearful.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po'i rjes su 'brangs pa dang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po la yongs su zhus /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po'i rjes su 'brangs pa dang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po la yongs su zhus /
translated: If you ask why,

original: yongs su dris pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: yongs su dris pa'i phyir te /
translated: it is because those sons of enlightened heritage and daughters of enlightened heritage have followed many tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas, and those sons of enlightened heritage and daughters of enlightened heritage have asked many tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas questions.

original: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: rigs kyi bu bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage will perfect the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: Those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage will perfect the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration, the transcendent perfection of perseverance, the transcendent perfection of tolerance, the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //🔽rigs kyi bu @336a *//🔽dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // rigs kyi bu @336a *// dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the transcendent perfection of generosity.🔽Those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage🔽will perfect inner emptiness.

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage will perfect . . . up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage will perfect the applications of mindfulness.

original: rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage will perfect the authentic eliminations, the supports for miraculous ability, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the noble eightfold path.

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
translated: Those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage will perfect the noble truths, the meditative concentrations, the immeasurable aspirations, the formless meditative absorptions, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption,

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: and emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness, as well as the extrasensory powers.

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those sons and daughters of good family will perfect the dhāraṇī gateway.

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su @336b rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su @336b rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those sons and daughters of good family will perfect the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan par 'gyur te /
translated: those sons and daughters of good family will be well-established in roots of virtue.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du skye bo mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du skye bo mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will work for the benefit of many beings for the sake of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar sh'a radva ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni ngas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod do //
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar sh'a radva ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni ngas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod do //
translated: “Śāriputra, I have spoken to those sons of a good family and daughters of a good family about the discourse endowed with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang //
analyzed: 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang //
translated: The lord buddhas, the tathāgatas, the saints, the perfectly awakened ones, however many there have been in the past,

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod de //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod de //
translated: those lord buddhas also have spoken to those sons of a good family and daughters of a good family about the discourse endowed with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de dag tshe 'das nas kyang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de dag tshe 'das nas kyang 'di lta ste /
translated: And after they have passed away,🔽they will practice for the sake of just this—

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nyid kyi don du spyod pa nyid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nyid kyi don du spyod pa nyid du 'gyur te /
translated: namely, unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de dag gzhan la'ang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de dag gzhan la'ang 'di lta ste /
translated: And they will also speak to others in just this way—

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du rnam pa de lta bu nyid brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du rnam pa de lta bu nyid brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: namely, for the sake of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”🔽“Subhūti, those sons of a good family and daughters of a good family who will take up this deep perfection of wisdom, who will bear it in mind, recite it, study it, and who will also properly pay attention to it, will have many advantages.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur te /
translated: those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage will be absorbed in meditative equipoise.

original: de dag ni bdud dam bdud kyi rigs kyi lha rnams kyis kyang /
analyzed: de dag ni bdud dam bdud kyi rigs kyi lha rnams kyis kyang /
translated: Even the māras or gods of the māra class will be unable

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog par mi nus na /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog par mi nus na /
translated: to turn them away from unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: sdig to la mos pa dang / sdig to'i spyod pa can shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gzhan gyis lta ci smos /
analyzed: sdig to la mos pa dang / sdig to'i spyod pa can shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gzhan gyis lta ci smos /
translated: Needless to say, this will also be the case for others who are devoted to evil and whose conduct is evil, and who engage in this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatī­putra,

original: byang @337a *// chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas /
analyzed: byang @337a *// chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas /
translated: those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage in the vehicle of the bodhisattvas, after hearing this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom,

original: dga' zhing nyams bde ba rgya chen po skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dga' zhing nyams bde ba rgya chen po skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: will experience a vast sense of joy and well-being.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du skye bo mang po yang dge ba'i chos la 'god par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du skye bo mang po yang dge ba'i chos la 'god par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will establish many beings in virtuous attributes for the sake of unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni nga'i mdun du 'di skad du /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni nga'i mdun du 'di skad du /
translated: Those sons and daughters of good family have said in my presence:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ‘Bhagavat,

original: bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: when we are practicing the bodhisattva way of life,

original: srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub tu rab tu dgod par bgyi'o //
analyzed: srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub tu rab tu dgod par bgyi'o //
translated: we will establish many hundreds of living beings, many thousands of living beings, many hundreds of thousands of living beings in Awakening.

original: yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o //🔽yang dag par bskul bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o // yang dag par bskul bar bgyi'o //
translated: We will teach them.🔽We will exhort them.

original: yang dag par gzengs bstod par bgyi'o //
analyzed: yang dag par gzengs bstod par bgyi'o //
translated: We will encourage them.

original: yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o //
translated: We will satisfy them.

original: phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so //
translated: We will prophesy their irreversibility.’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshig ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshig ni /
translated: those sons and daughters of good family

original: sems la sems kyis rnam par bltas te ngas rjes su dgyes pa mdzad do //
analyzed: sems la sems kyis rnam par bltas te ngas rjes su dgyes pa mdzad do //
translated: have looked at their minds with their minds, and I have approved.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra,

original: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar yang /
analyzed: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar yang /
translated: In the presence of the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas of the past,

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'di skad du /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'di skad du /
translated: those sons and daughters of noble family said,

original: bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod @337b pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod @337b pa'i tshe /
translated: ‘When we practice bodhisattva conduct,

original: srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub tu dgod par bgyi'o //
analyzed: srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub tu dgod par bgyi'o //
translated: we will establish many hundreds of beings, many thousands of beings, and many hundreds of thousands of beings in awakening.

original: yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o //🔽yang dag par bskul bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o // yang dag par bskul bar bgyi'o //
translated: We will teach them correctly.🔽We will encourage them.

original: yang dag par gzengs bstod par bgyi'o //
analyzed: yang dag par gzengs bstod par bgyi'o //
translated: We will inspire them.

original: yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o //
analyzed: yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o //
translated: We will delight them.

original: phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog par lung bstan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so //
translated: We will give them irreversible prophecy.’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshig na /
analyzed: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshig na /
translated: The tathāgatas, arhats, and samyaksaṃbuddhas of the past also praised the words of those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage.🔽

original: sems la thugs kyis rnam par gzigs te rjes su dgyes pa mdzad do //
analyzed: sems la thugs kyis rnam par gzigs te rjes su dgyes pa mdzad do //
translated: The tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas of the past also, with their minds, looked upon and rejoiced in the words of those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatī­putra,

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: when those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage are practicing the conduct of the bodhisattvas,

original: srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rab tu 'god par 'gyur /
analyzed: srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rab tu 'god par 'gyur /
translated: they will establish many hundreds of living beings, many hundreds of thousands of living beings, and many hundreds of thousands of millions of living beings in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: yang dag par ston par 'gyur /🔽yang dag par bskul par 'gyur /
analyzed: yang dag par ston par 'gyur / yang dag par bskul par 'gyur /
translated: They will reveal it.🔽They will encourage it.

original: yang dag par gzengs bstod par 'gyur /🔽yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: yang dag par gzengs bstod par 'gyur / yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur /
translated: They will make it clear.🔽They will make it manifest.🔽They will make it known.

original: phyir mi ldog par lung ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog par lung ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will give prophecy.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatī­putra,

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg la mos pa rlabs po cher 'gyur te /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg la mos pa rlabs po cher 'gyur te /
translated: those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage will have an expansive interest in form, sound,

original: de @338a *// dag sbyin pa rlabs po che gtong par 'gyur /
analyzed: de @338a *// dag sbyin pa rlabs po che gtong par 'gyur /
translated: and tactile sensations, and they will practice generosity on an expansive scale.

original: sbyin pa rlabs po che gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbyin pa rlabs po che gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having practiced generosity on an expansive scale, they will create roots of virtue on an expansive scale.

original: de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che mngon par 'du byas nas /
analyzed: de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che mngon par 'du byas nas /
translated: Having created roots of virtue on an expansive scale,

original: rnam par smin pa rlabs po che yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa rlabs po che yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will acquire an expansive karmic maturation.

original: de dag rnam par smin pa rlabs po che yongs su bzung nas /
analyzed: de dag rnam par smin pa rlabs po che yongs su bzung nas /
translated: Having acquired an expansive karmic maturation,

original: sems can de dag nyid kyi don du rnam par smin pa rlabs po che las de bas kyang ches rlabs che ba'i rnam par smin pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can de dag nyid kyi don du rnam par smin pa rlabs po che las de bas kyang ches rlabs che ba'i rnam par smin pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: for the sake of those very sentient beings, they will acquire a karmic maturation that is even more expansive than that expansive karmic maturation.

original: de ltar phyi'am nang gi dngos po de dag kyang sems can de dag nyid la yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar phyi'am nang gi dngos po de dag kyang sems can de dag nyid la yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te /
translated: In this way, they will give away to those very sentient beings those outer and inner things.

original: de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis /
analyzed: de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis /
translated: By means of those very wholesome roots,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gang na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gang na /
translated: they will be reborn in a pure buddhafield in another world system,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: where a tathāgata, an arhat, a fully enlightened buddha is living,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid kyi chos ston pa mngon du gyur pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa la brten par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid kyi chos ston pa mngon du gyur pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa la brten par 'gyur ro //
translated: teaching the Dharma, and so on, and where this very profound perfection of wisdom is being taught.

original: de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams las /
analyzed: de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams las /
translated: From those tathāgatas, arhats, and fully enlightened buddhas,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mngon sum du thos nas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mngon sum du thos nas /
translated: they will hear this very profound perfection of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu'ang srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag @338b mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu'ang srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag @338b mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: In those buddha-fields, too, he will reveal to many hundreds of living beings, to many thousands of living beings, to many hundreds of thousands of living beings, the supreme enlightenment.🔽He will exhort them,🔽he will encourage them,

original: yang dag par bskul bar 'gyur ro //🔽yang dag par gzengs bstod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag par bskul bar 'gyur ro // yang dag par gzengs bstod par 'gyur ro //
translated: he will cheer them.🔽He will be a teacher of many living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many hundreds of living beings,🔽a teacher of many thousands of living beings, a teacher of many hundreds of thousands of living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many hundreds of thousands of niyutas of koṭis of living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many koṭis of nayutas of niyutas of living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many niyutas of koṭis of living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many thousands of living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many hundreds of living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many living beings.

original: yang dag par dga' bar byed pa 'gyur ro //🔽gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: yang dag par dga' bar byed pa 'gyur ro // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He will be a teacher of many hundreds of thousands of living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many hundreds of thousands of niyutas of koṭis of living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many koṭis of nayutas of niyutas of living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many niyutas of koṭis of living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many thousands of living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many hundreds of living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many hundreds of thousands of living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many hundreds of thousands of niyutas of koṭis of living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many koṭis of nayutas of niyutas of living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many niyutas of koṭis of living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many thousands of living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many hundreds of living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many hundreds of thousands of living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many hundreds of thousands of niyutas of koṭis of living beings.🔽He will be a teacher of many koṭis of nayutas of niyutas of living beings.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams las /🔽chos gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams las /🔽chos gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis la /
translated: He will be a teacher of many niyutas of koṭis of living beings

original: de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis te; sems can rnams kyi sems thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis pa ni ngo mtshar che ste /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis te; sems can rnams kyi sems thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis pa ni ngo mtshar che ste /
translated: There is nothing that is not known to the Tathāgata, nothing that is not seen, nothing that is not witnessed, nothing that is not fully understood.

original: 'di ltar 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to //
translated: The bodhisattvas of the past tathāgatas are also known.

original: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to //
analyzed: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to //
translated: The past tathāgatas are also known.

original: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to //
analyzed: 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to //
translated: The buddha realms and śrāvakas of the past tathāgatas are also known.

original: ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to //
analyzed: ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to //
translated: The bodhisattvas of the future tathāgatas are also known.

original: ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to //
analyzed: ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to //
translated: The buddha realms and śrāvakas of the future tathāgatas are also known.

original: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to //
translated: He knows the bodhisattvas of the present thus-gone ones.

original: da @339a *// ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to //
analyzed: da @339a *// ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to //
translated: He knows the buddha-fields and śrāvakas of the present thus-gone ones.

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to //
translated: He knows the bodhisattvas of all the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas dwelling, sustaining, and teaching the Dharma in the world systems of the ten directions.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to //
translated: He knows the buddha-fields and śrāvakas of those thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: gang yang byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi slad du brtson par bgyid cing /🔽pha rol tu phyin pa drug pho 'di dag 'tshol ba dang / yongs su 'tshol ba'i tshe /
analyzed: gang yang byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi slad du brtson par bgyid cing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug pho 'di dag 'tshol ba dang / yongs su 'tshol ba'i tshe /
translated: “Moreover, Blessed One, bodhisattva great beings who strive for these six perfections🔽and who seek and thoroughly investigate these six perfections

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'tshol ba dang / yongs su 'tshol ba las kyang /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'tshol ba dang / yongs su 'tshol ba las kyang /
translated: will, when seeking and investigating these six perfections,

original: la las ni btsal ba las pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag thob par 'gyur /
analyzed: la las ni btsal ba las pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag thob par 'gyur /
translated: some of them attain the six perfections through seeking,

original: la las ni thob bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: la las ni thob bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and some of them will not attain them.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: “Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: that is not the case.

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo brtson 'grus mi gtong ba de dag kun gyis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag thams cad 'grub @339b par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo brtson 'grus mi gtong ba de dag kun gyis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag thams cad 'grub @339b par 'gyur ro //
translated: All those sons of good family and daughters of good family who do not give up on diligence will accomplish all these six perfections.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi don du brtson par byed pa'i phyir ro //🔽gsol pa; ci lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi don du brtson par byed pa'i phyir ro // gsol pa; ci lags / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: It is because those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage will strive for the sake of these six transcendent perfections.

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo zab mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di dag kun kyang 'grub par 'gyur ram /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo zab mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di dag kun kyang 'grub par 'gyur ram / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” “Lord, will those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage accomplish all these profound sutras endowed with the six transcendent perfections?

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: ” The Blessed One replied, “Śāradvatī­putra,

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo zab mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di dag mi 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo zab mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di dag mi 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med /
translated: it is impossible and there is no chance that those sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage will not accomplish these profound sutras endowed with the six transcendent perfections.

original: skabs med do //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: skabs med do // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: There is no such possibility.🔽If you ask why, Śāradvatī­putra,

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: it is because

original: de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems can rnams yang dag par ston cing yang dag par bskul ba dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par dga' bar byed pa dang / 'god cing rab tu gzhog pa las kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems can rnams yang dag par ston cing yang dag par bskul ba dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang / yang dag par dga' bar byed pa dang / 'god cing rab tu gzhog pa las kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te /
translated: In this way, they will be able to teach sentient beings to be truly established in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, to be truly inspired, to be truly encouraged, to be truly delighted, to be established, and to be settled.

original: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Śāriputra!

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag tshe 'das nas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag tshe 'das nas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: Those sons of a good family and daughters of a good family, after they have passed away, will accomplish these six perfections.

original: de dag ni nam yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas; sems can yongs su smin par ma byas /
analyzed: de dag ni nam yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas; sems can yongs su smin par ma byas /
translated: They will never not purify a buddhafield, never not bring sentient beings to maturity,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du ji skad du bstan pa'i pha @340a *//
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du ji skad du bstan pa'i pha @340a *//
translated: and never not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag las brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed do //
analyzed: rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag las brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed do //
translated: They do not let their effort decline in regard to these six perfections.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las /
translated: In the Perfection of Wisdom in Twenty-five Thousand Lines,

original: le'u sum cu pa'o ////🔽de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
analyzed: le'u sum cu pa'o //// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
translated: the thirtieth chapter is called “The Questions of Subhūti.”

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa /
translated: those sons of good family and daughters of good family who have set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa /
translated: who practice the six perfections,

original: sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa /
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa /
translated: who bring beings to maturity,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gi yon tan yongs su brjod pa ni 'di dag lags na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gi yon tan yongs su brjod pa ni 'di dag lags na /
translated: and who take hold of a buddhafield—

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Lord,

original: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa de dag la bar chad du 'gyur ba ji lta bu dag mchis /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa de dag la bar chad du 'gyur ba ji lta bu dag mchis /
translated: what kinds of obstacles will there be for those sons of good family and daughters of good family who practice for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / spobs pa ha cang 'phyi ste skye na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / spobs pa ha cang 'phyi ste skye na /
translated: “Subhūti, if eloquence arises too late,

original: rab 'byor / de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, that should be known by bodhisattva great beings as the work of Māra.🔽”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Lord,

original: ci'i slad du spobs pa ha cang 'phyi ste skye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ci'i slad du spobs pa ha cang 'phyi ste skye bar 'gyur /
translated: why does eloquence arise too late?

original: de ni ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi /
analyzed: de ni ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi /
translated: Why should bodhisattva great beings know that as the work of Māra?🔽”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems @340b dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems @340b dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Subhūti, here when bodhisattva great beings are practicing the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed /
translated: they complete the perfection of wisdom with difficulty.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed na /🔽rab 'byor / rnam grangs des shin tu 'phyi ste spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed na / rab 'byor / rnam grangs des shin tu 'phyi ste spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the perfection of meditative stability, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of moral discipline, and the perfection of generosity.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang shin tu myur bar spobs pa skye na /
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o // rab 'byor / gzhan yang shin tu myur bar spobs pa skye na /
translated: Subhūti, for this reason, too, you should know that this is the work of Māra.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that this is the work of Māra.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti then asked, “Blessed One,

original: ci'i slad du shin tu myur bar spobs pa skye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: ci'i slad du shin tu myur bar spobs pa skye bar 'gyur /
translated: why is it that this inspiration comes so quickly?

original: de ni ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi //
analyzed: de ni ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi //
translated: Why should a bodhisattva great being know this to be the work of Māra?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied:

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: “Subhūti, here when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of generosity, the perfection of conduct, the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom,

original: thabs @341a *// mi mkhas pas /
analyzed: thabs @341a *// mi mkhas pas /
translated: they lack skill in means.

original: ha cang myur bar spobs pa skye la /
analyzed: ha cang myur bar spobs pa skye la /
translated: They give rise to eloquence too quickly

original: des rlom sems su byed na /
analyzed: des rlom sems su byed na /
translated: and become conceited by it.

original: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des spobs pa ha cang myur bar skye ba ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / rnam grangs des spobs pa ha cang myur bar skye ba ste /
translated: Subhūti, for this reason eloquence arises too quickly

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: and bodhisattva great beings should recognize it as the work of Māra.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang glal zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang glal zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri na /

analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa @342a *//
translated: When this was said, the venerable

analyzed: rab 'byor gyis /
translated: Subhūti

translated: said to the Blessed One,🔽“Blessed One, what are the other letters?”

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du 'di'i ro ma myong nas stan las langs te 'gro na /

original: bcom ldan 'das /

original: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: The Lord said, “Subhūti, it is because those bodhisattva great beings who have not trained in the perfection of wisdom, the perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bsten pa'i tshe /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bsten pa'i tshe /
translated: the perfection of morality, and the perfection of giving, when they are studying this deep perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las bdag cag lung ma bstan to zhes ma dad pa'i yid kyis stan las langs shing 'dong ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las bdag cag lung ma bstan to zhes ma dad pa'i yid kyis stan las langs shing 'dong ste /
translated: “We have not been predicted in this perfection of wisdom,” and with a mind of no faith they will rise from their seats and leave.

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should know that this is the work of Māra.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽ci'i slad du /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / ci'i slad du /
translated: “Lord,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las lung ma bstan pa de dag stan las langs shing mchi bar 'gyur /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las lung ma bstan pa de dag stan las langs shing mchi bar 'gyur /
translated: why is it that those who have not been predicted in the perfection of wisdom will rise from their seats and leave?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' @342b sems dpa' chen po skyon med par ma chud pa ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' @342b sems dpa' chen po skyon med par ma chud pa ni /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings who have not entered into flawlessness

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan te /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan te /
translated: are not predicted to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de la bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las mi 'byung ngo; ;bdag gi ming yang yongs su ma brjod do //
analyzed: de la bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las mi 'byung ngo; ;bdag gi ming yang yongs su ma brjod do //
translated: They will think, ‘I am not coming forth from this perfection of wisdom. My name has not been proclaimed.’

original: zhes dad par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: zhes dad par mi 'gyur na /
translated: If they do not have faith in that,

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, this also should be known as the work of Māra.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Subhūti said, “Blessed One,

original: ci'i slad du /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming yongs su ma brjod pa lags; bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: ci'i slad du / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming yongs su ma brjod pa lags; bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: why is that?🔽Why are the names of those bodhisattva great beings not mentioned in this profound perfection of wisdom?”

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa rnams kyi ming ni yongs su mi brjod de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa rnams kyi ming ni yongs su mi brjod de /
translated: The Blessed One said, “Subhūti, the names of those bodhisattva great beings who have not received a prophecy are not mentioned.

original: de la bdag gi ming yang 'di las mi 'byung /
analyzed: de la bdag gi ming yang 'di las mi 'byung /
translated: In that case, their own names do not appear here,

original: bdag gang du skyes pa'i grong ngam /
analyzed: bdag gang du skyes pa'i grong ngam /
translated: and the names of the towns,

original: grong khyer ram /
analyzed: grong khyer ram /
translated: cities,

original: grong rdal gyi ming yang mi 'byung ngo zhes /
analyzed: grong rdal gyi ming yang mi 'byung ngo zhes /
translated: or villages where they were born do not appear.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyan to snyam byed cing /🔽'khor de nas 'gro bar sems na /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyan to snyam byed cing / 'khor de nas 'gro bar sems na /
translated: Thinking, ‘I will not listen to the perfection of wisdom,’🔽they think of leaving that assembly.

original: sems bskyed pa des ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar sems shing /
analyzed: sems bskyed pa des ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar sems shing /
translated: As they think of leaving,

original: gom pa ji snyed cig bor ba de snyed kyi bskal pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te; de dag la gzod brtson par bya dgos so //
analyzed: gom pa ji snyed cig bor ba de snyed kyi bskal pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te; de dag la gzod brtson par bya dgos so //
translated: and they will hold on to the eons that they have taken steps for, and they will have to make an effort for them.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing /
translated: They will reject the perfection of wisdom,

original: mdo sde gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa de dag kun @343a *//
analyzed: mdo sde gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa de dag kun @343a *//
translated: and they will think that they should master those discourses that do not bring about the knowledge of a knower of all aspects.

original: chub par bya bar sems te /
analyzed: chub par bya bar sems te /
translated: They will think that they should master them.

original: des na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing gi rtsa ba spangs te /
analyzed: des na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing gi rtsa ba spangs te /
translated: Therefore, those sons of a good family and those daughters of a good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle will reject the root of the tree of the knowledge of a knower of all aspects

original: de nyid kyi yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma la 'ju bar sems par gyur pa dag ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma la 'ju bar sems par gyur pa dag ste /
translated: and will think that they should master its branches, leaves, and petals.

original: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should know that too to be the work of Māra.🔽Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa'i mdo sde kun chub par bgyi bar sems par 'gyur ba de dag gang lags /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa'i mdo sde kun chub par bgyi bar sems par 'gyur ba de dag gang lags /
translated: What are the sūtras that do not accomplish the wisdom of omniscience that they think to master?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽mdo sde gang nyan thos dang ldan pa'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / mdo sde gang nyan thos dang ldan pa'am /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Those sūtras that are about the śrāvakas

original: rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag ste /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag ste /
translated: or about the pratyekabuddhas.

original: 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
translated: They are the four establishments of mindfulness, the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, and the eightfold noble path.
